defaultRecipient

Summary
Default recipients are simply pointers to contacts that should be the default recipients of emails generated from email templates.


Fields
Name Type Attributes Description
auditLogTitle  calculated
max length: 1000
allows all 		abstract
  		This is used a the title in auditLogs. This should NEVER be null.
